Table of Contents

Namespace Vts.MonteCarlo.Tissues

Classes

BoundedTissue

Implements ITissue. Defines a tissue geometry comprised of a layered slab bounded laterally by a TissueRegion.

BoundingCylinderTissueInput

Implements ITissueInput. Defines input to BoundingCylinderTissue class which is comprised of multilayer tissue bounded laterally by vertical cylinder

CaplessCylinderTissueRegion

Implements ITissueRegion. Defines cylindrical region with axis along z-axis and dimensions Center, Radius and Height with NO CAPS (used for BoundingCylinderTissue).

CylinderTissueRegion

Implements ITissueRegion. Defines cylindrical region finite along z-axis with Center at (xc,yc,zc) Radius and Height where cylinder caps on planes (zc-Height/2) and (zc+Height/2).

CylinderTissueRegionToolbox

Helper methods for cylindrical tissue region methods. For example, ray intersect infinite cylinder of given axis alignment and ray intersect finite cylinder. Currently this method only makes sense with our current tissue classes, if axis alignment is along x- or y- axes because if along z-axis will intersect tissue surface and bottom.

EllipsoidTissueRegion

Implements ITissueRegion. Defines ellipsoid given Center, and Axis radii along x,y,z axis.

InfiniteCylinderTissueRegion

Implements ITissueRegion. Defines cylindrical region infinite along y-axis with center at (xc,zc).

LayerTissueRegion

Implements ITissueRegion. Defines a layer infinite in extent along x,y-axes and with extent along z-axis given by ZRange.

LayerTissueRegionToolbox

Helper methods for layer tissue region methods. For example, ray intersect infinite plane at z=constant

MultiConcentricInfiniteCylinderTissue

Implements ITissue. Defines tissue geometries comprised of layers (including homogenous with air layers above and below). Layers are infinite along x- and y- axes.

MultiConcentricInfiniteCylinderTissueInput

Implements ITissueInput. Defines input to MultiConcentricInfiniteCylinderTissue class. This assumes infinite cylinders are concentric and lie entirely within a layer.

MultiEllipsoidTissueInput

Implements ITissueInput. Defines input to SingleEllipsoidTissue class.

MultiLayerTissue

Implements ITissue. Defines tissue geometries comprised of layers (including homogenous with air layers above and below). Layers are infinite along x- and y- axes.

MultiLayerTissueInput

Implements ITissueInput. Defines input to MultiLayerTissue class.

MultiLayerWithSurfaceFiberTissue

Implements ITissue. Defines tissue geometries comprised of layers (including homogenous with air layers above and below). Layers are infinite along x- and y- axes.

MultiLayerWithSurfaceFiberTissueInput

Implements ITissueInput. Defines input to MultiLayerTissueWithSurfaceFiber class. This class is not created using SingleInclusionTissue. Instead it is designed like MultiLayerTissue so that Photon CrossRegionOrReflect can ask int neighborIndex = _tissue.GetNeighborRegionIndex(this); double nNext = _tissue.Regions[neighborIndex].RegionOP.N; and get the detector N when the photon is residing in the fiber circle.

SemiInfiniteTissueInput

Implements ITissueInput. Defines input to SemiInfiniteTissueInput class.

SemiInfiniteTissueRegion

Implements ITissueRegion. Defines a layer infinite in extent along x,y-axes and with extent along z-axis given by ZRange.

SingleCylinderTissueInput

Implements ITissueInput. Defines input to SingleCylinderTissue class.

SingleEllipsoidTissueInput

Implements ITissueInput. Defines input to SingleEllipsoidTissue class.

SingleInclusionTissue

Implements ITissue. Defines a tissue geometry comprised of an inclusion embedded within a layered slab.

SingleInfiniteCylinderTissueInput

Implements ITissueInput. Defines input to SingleInfiniteCylinderTissue class.

SingleVoxelTissueInput

Implements ITissueInput. Defines input to SingleVoxelTissue class.

SurfaceFiberTissueRegion

Implements ITissueRegion. Defines circular region at surface of tissue

TissueBase

Base class for all tissue definitions.

TissueInput

Base class for all tissue inputs

VoxelTissueRegion

Implements ITissueRegion. Defines Cartesian coordinate voxel with x,y,z ranges.
